mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EVENT e LEFT JOIN COUPON_DETAIL cd ON e.EID = cd.EID WHERE e.ECOUPONTITLE=#{eCouponName}

select e.EID as eId ,e.ECOUPONTITLE as eCouponTitle, e.ETYPE as eType, e.EDISCOUNT as Ediscount, cd.CPID as cpId from EVENT e join COUPON_DETAIL cd on e.EID = cd.EID where cd.MEMAIL = #{mEmail} and cd.CPUSEDATE is null
mapper.update: update COUPON_DETAIL set CPUSEDATE = #{useDt} where CPID = #{cpId}
update ORDERS set OUSED_MILEAGE = #{usedMl} where OID = #{oid}
update MEMBER set MMILEAGE =MMILEAGE-#{mMileage} + (#{oprice}*5/100) where MEMAIL = #{mEmail}
